title: AssetManifest.media
description: Resolved media asset list produced by the media acquisition layer. Each item in `items` corresponds to one asset from the source AssetManifest.

schema_version.description: Schema version. Increment when the envelope or item shape changes.

manifest_id.description: Copied verbatim from the source AssetManifest.manifest_id for traceability.

project_id.description: Copied from the source AssetManifest.project_id when present.

producer.description: Component that generated this file, e.g. 'media/generate_media.py'.

generated_at.description: ISO-8601 UTC generation timestamp. MUST be '1970-01-01T00:00:00Z' for deterministic (local/cached) builds.

items.description: Ordered list of resolved assets, one per asset_id in the source manifest.

ResolvedAsset.description: A single resolved asset record produced by a resolver.

asset_id.description: Original asset identifier from the source AssetManifest.

uri.description: Resolved URI. 'file://' for real assets; 'placeholder://<type>/<id>' when unresolved. HTTP/HTTPS is explicitly disallowed.

is_placeholder.description: True when no real asset was found and a placeholder sentinel was emitted.

rights_warning.description: Non-empty when license_type is outside the approved set. Empty string means no warning.

schema_version.description: Per-item schema version. Increment when item fields change.

producer.description: Resolver component that produced this item, e.g. 'media/resolvers/local'.

AssetMetadata.description: Minimum provenance metadata per ยง25.2 of the pipeline spec.

attribution.description: Attribution text required by CC-BY and similar licenses. Empty string when not applicable.

purchase_record.description: URI or reference to invoice/license document. Empty string in Phase 0.

provider_or_model.description: Source platform, tool, or generative model name.

retrieval_date.description: ISO-8601 UTC acquisition date. MUST be '1970-01-01T00:00:00Z' for local/cached assets to guarantee deterministic byte-identical output.

AssetSource.description: Indicates which resolver tier produced this asset.

type.description: Resolver tier. 'generated_placeholder' is the fallback when all tiers fail.

AssetLicense.description: SPDX-oriented license block for downstream attribution and rights tracking.

spdx_id.description: SPDX license identifier (e.g. 'CC0-1.0', 'LicenseRef-proprietary') or 'NOASSERTION' when not determined.

attribution_required.description: True when the license mandates attribution in downstream outputs.

text.description: Full license text. Empty string when not retrieved or not applicable.
